thing-type.label: ZME_KFOB-S Secure 4 Button Key Chain Controller
thing-type.description: Secure 4 Button Key Chain Controller<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Z-Wave.Me Key Fob is a Z-Wave device that can both control other Z-Wave devices and activate predefined scenes in an IP gateway. Although it is controlling other devices the fob can?t act as Z-Wave network controller (primary or secondary) and will always need a Z-Wave network controller to be included into a Z-Wave network. The Key Fob can be used in five different modes that are picked by configuration commands:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtDirect Control of associated Devices with On/Off/Dim commands</li&gt <li&gtDirect Control of associated Devices with On/Off commands</li&gt <li&gtSwitch All On/Off</li&gt <li&gtScene Activation in IP Gateway</li&gt <li&gtDirect Activation of preconfigured Scenes</li&gt <li&gtDirect Control of Devices in proximity</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec</li&gt <li&gt Button 3 confirms standard inclusion/exclusion by a primary controller,</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec</li&gt <li&gt Button 3 confirms standard inclusion/exclusion by a primary controller,</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec</li&gt <li&gtButton 2 issues a node information frame or wakeup notification</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameter.description: Set Button 1 and 3 pair mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIn separate mode button 1 works with group A, button 3 with groups C. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group A, double click with group C. Default Value: 01</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameter.description: Set Button 2 and 4 pair mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIn separate mode button 2 works with control group B, button 4 with control group D. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button B/D are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B, double click with group D. Default Value: 01</p&gt</p&gt
